official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal rebasing of payments for home health
			 services, as required under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care
			 Act, and to replace such rebasing with a Medicare home health value-based
			 purchasing program, and for other purposes.

text.#text:
The age, poverty level, gender, rural residence, ethnic or racial minority, and infirmity of
			 Medicare beneficiaries receiving home health services in comparison to
			 other Medicare beneficiaries.
The number, gender, and geographic distribution of professional Medicare home health caregivers.

The number and location of home health agencies that have closed, consolidated, or been acquired
			 since the rebasing reduction was implemented.

The number and location of professional home health caregiver jobs that have been lost since the
			 rebasing reduction was implemented.
